security.security.login.title: Log in
security.security.login.already_logged_in_as: You are already logged in as %username%
security.security.change_password.title: Password change
security.security.change_password.error.two_passw: The two passwords are not the same.
security.security.change_password.error.password_: Password should be at least 8 characters in length and should include at least one upper case letter, one number, and one special character.
security.security.resetting.title: Reset Password
security.security.resetting.check_email:
An email has been sent. It contains a link you must click to reset your password.
Note: You can only request a new password once within %tokenLifetime% hours.

If you don't get an email check your spam folder or try again.
security.security.resetting.locked_account:
Your password cannot be reset because your account is locked.

Please contact the administrator.
security.security.resetting.flash.success: The password has been reset successfully.
security.security.resetting.email.subject: Reset Password
security.security.resetting.email.message:
Hello %username%!

To reset your password - please visit %confirmationUrl%

Regards,
the Team.
security.Authentication credentials could not be: Authentication credentials could not be found.
security.Authentication request could not be proc: Authentication request could not be processed due to a system problem.
security.Cookie has already been used by someone: Cookie has already been used by someone else.
Not privileged to request the resource.
security.No authentication provider found to supp: No authentication provider found to support the authentication token.
security.No session available, it either timed ou: No session available, it either timed out or cookies are not enabled.
security.Too many failed login attempts, please t: Too many failed login attempts, please try again later.
